params.name: assumeRoleARN
params.label: IAM Role ARN to assume
params.description: Assumes an IAM role to perform cluster operations instead of the default AWS credential provider chain. If empty, uses AWS credentials defined above

params.name: k8sVersion
params.label: Kubernetes version
params.description: Leave empty for current default of eksctl

params.name: privateCluster
params.label: Fully-private
params.description: VPC endpoints will be created for the cluster. The first security group of the Network Settings will be used as shared SG.

params.name: skipEndpointCreation
params.label: Skip VPC Endpoints creation
params.description: If the VPC endpoints already exist, don't attempt to create new ones

params.name: injectedSG
params.label: Injected DSS SG
params.description: Security group id to add as inbound on the cluster's autocreated SGs. Should allow inbound traffic from DSS.

params.name: makePrivateOnly
params.label: Revoke public access
params.description: If true, the EKS endpoint is made private-only (otherwise it will remain both public and private)

params.name: advancedYaml
params.label: Advanced Configuration
params.description: Use YAML. If you use advanced configuration, presets will not be used. For examples, see https://github.com/weaveworks/eksctl/tree/master/examples
